name: Terragen Plugin
summary: Learn about .TGP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: If you want to install a TGP plugin, place it in the Terragen\â€‹Plugins directory. When you restart Terragen, the plugin is automatically loaded.
NOTE: The TGP file was used by Terragen Classic, which is now discontinued. Terragen Classic will only run on Microsoft Windows XP, ME, 2000, Vista, 7, and 8.

description: A TGP file is a plugin used by Terragen Classic, a photorealistic natural scenery generation program. It contains a plugin, which includes information that extends the capabilities of Terragen when installed. TGP files are used to add a variety of features to Terragen, such as camera effects and new landscapes.
